mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (username, mem_name, mem_tel, mem_email, mem_gender, make_date, mem_birth, mem_addr) VALUES(#{memberDto.username}, #{memberDto.mem_name}, #{memberDto.mem_tel}, #{memberDto.mem_email}, #{memberDto.mem_gender}, #{memberDto.make_date}, #{memberDto.mem_birth}, #{memberDto.mem_addr})

INSERT INTO member (username, mem_name, mem_tel, mem_email, mem_gender, make_date, mem_birth, mem_addr) VALUES(#{username}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_tel}, #{mem_email}, #{mem_gender}, #{make_date}, #{mem_birth}, #{mem_addr})
